mapper.select: select t1.TABLE_NAME, t1.COLUMN_NAME , t1.NULLABLE , t1.COLUMN_ID , t1.DATA_DEFAULT, t1.DATA_TYPE, t2.comments, t1.DATA_TYPE || '(' || decode(t1.DATA_TYPE, '', t1.DATA_PRECISION + t1.DATA_SCALE, t1.data_length) || ')' as from user_tab_cols t1, user_col_comments t2 where t1.TABLE_NAME = t2.table_name and t1.COLUMN_NAME = t2.column_name and t1.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t1.COLUMN_ID;
select tablespace_name from sys.dba_tablespaces where tablespace_name not in ('SYSAUX','UNDOTBS1','TEMP','USERS','EXAMPLE');

select t.INDEX_NAME as INDEX_NAME , t.TABLE_NAME as TABLE_NAME, t.COLUMN_NAME as COLUMN_NAME, t.COLUMN_POSITION as COLUMN_POSITION, t.DESCEND as DESCEND, i.INDEX_TYPE as INDEX_TYPE from user_ind_columns t,user_indexes i where t.index_name = i.index_name and t.table_name = i.table_name and t.table_name =#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
